column2: Victoria's Secret owner L Brands to restructure businessUPDATE 1-L Brands to restructure Victoria's Secret business April 7 Victoria's Secret owner L Brands Inc  reported March sales at established stores above analysts' expectations and said it would restructure its business to focus on core categories.  UPDATE 1-L Brands to restructure Victoria's Secret business April 7 Victoria's Secret owner L Brands Inc  reported March sales at established stores above analysts' expectations and said it would restructure its business to focus on core categories. April 7 Victoria's Secret owner L Brands Inc  reported March sales at established stores above analysts' expectations and said it would restructure its business to focus on core categories.UPDATE 1-L Brands to restructure Victoria's Secret business April 7 Victoria's Secret owner L Brands Inc  reported March sales at established stores above analysts' expectations and said it would restructure its business to focus on core categories.

MDLZ,Mondelez to sell Oreo, Cadbury products on Alibaba's TmallBRIEF-Mondelez International launches strategic e-commerce partnership with Alibaba * Mondelez International launches strategic e-commerce partnership with Alibaba group  BRIEF-Mondelez International launches strategic e-commerce partnership with Alibaba * Mondelez International launches strategic e-commerce partnership with Alibaba group April 7 Oreo maker Mondelez International Inc  said it had entered into a partnership with Alibaba Group Holding Ltd to sell its products through the Chinese e-commerce giant's online marketplace to expand its reach in China.BRIEF-Mondelez International launches strategic e-commerce partnership with Alibaba * Mondelez International launches strategic e-commerce partnership with Alibaba group  
PFE,UK Stocks-Factors to watch on April 7 April 7 Britain's FTSE 100 index is seen opening up 8 points, or 0.13 percent, on Thursday, according to financial bookmakers. For more on the factors affecting European stocks, please click on           * The UK blue chip index closed up 70.40 points, or 1.2 percent, on Wednesday at 6,161.63, boosted by pharmaceuticals companies as Pfizer  pulled out of a deal for Allergan, prompting speculation over other merger and acquisition activity in the sector.      * BP: Shareholder advisor 
SPG,UPDATE 4-Teen retailer Pacific Sunwear files for bankruptcyTeen retailer Pacific Sunwear files for bankruptcy Teen apparel retailer Pacific Sunwear of California Inc filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection on Thursday, succumbing to mounting losses and intense competition from fast-fashion retailers and online rivals.  Teen retailer Pacific Sunwear files for bankruptcy Teen apparel retailer Pacific Sunwear of California Inc filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection on Thursday, succumbing to mounting losses and intense competition from fast-fashion retailers and online rivals. * Shares fall more than 40 pct to record low   (Adds court ruling to restrict share trading, comments by lawyer for debtor)Teen retailer Pacific Sunwear files for bankruptcy Teen apparel retailer Pacific Sunwear of California Inc filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection on Thursday, succumbing to mounting losses and intense competition from fast-fashion retailers and online rivals.  
VRSK,Carlyle in the lead to buy Verisk Analytics' healthcare unit -sources April 7 Private equity firm Carlyle Group LP  is in advanced talks to acquire the healthcare information technology division of U.S. data analytics company Verisk Analytics Inc, according to people familiar with the matter.

WMT,Wal-Mart's head of U.S. online marketing leaves for startup April 7 The head of marketing for the U.S. online business of Wal-Mart Stores has left the retailer to return to a business-conference firm he founded, a company statement said on Thursday.
